heading: Today
text: Some sun, then clouds spreading north. Snow this afternoon in NY, reaching VT late.

heading: Wednesday
text: Chance of late-day snow showers west of the Greens.
temperature: Upper teens to mid 20s north, mid 20s to around 30 south

heading: Thursday
text: Chance of early snow showers east, then clouds decreasing.
temperature: Single digits to mid teens north, mid teens to lower 20s south

heading: Friday
text: Mostly to partly sunny. Chance of late-day snow showers in far northern New York.
temperature: Mid teens to lower 20s, some lower teens northeast
